egl.math

Class Matrix3

  • java.lang.Object
    • egl.math.Matrix3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Matrix3
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    3x3 Matrix With Column Major Ordering
    Single Precision
    Author:
    Cristian

 V = V / w

        createRotation
        

        public static Matrix3 createRotation(float t,
                     Matrix3 out)
        

        Create A Rotation Matrix Into Out
 
         |  cos(t) -sin(t)  0 |
 |  sin(t)  cos(t)  0 |
 |  0       0       1 |
 
        

        Parameters:
        t - Angle (Radians)
        out - Non-Null Output Matrix
        

        Returns:
        Out

        public static Matrix3 createRotationX(float t,
                      Matrix3 out)
        

        Create A X Rotation Matrix Into Out

 | 0   cos(t) -sin(t) |
 | 0   sin(t)  cos(t) |

 | -sin(t)  0   cos(t) |

      • 

        createOrthographic
        

        public static Matrix3 createOrthographic(float l,
                         float r,
                         float b,
                         float t,
                         Matrix3 out)
        

        Create An Orthographic Matrix Into Out
 
         Let w = r - l
 Let h = t - b
 |  2 / w  0      -(l + r) / w |
 |  0      2 / h  -(b + t) / h |
 |  0      0      1            |
 
        

        Parameters:
        l - Left Side Of Rect
        r - Right Side Of Rect
        b - Bottom Side Of Rect
        t - Top Side Of Rect
        out - Non-Null Output Matrix
        

        Returns:
        Out
        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        createOrthographic
        

        public static Matrix3 createOrthographic(float l,
                         float r,
                         float b,
                         float t)
        

        Parameters:
        l - Left Side Of Rect
        r - Right Side Of Rect
        b - Bottom Side Of Rect
        t - Top Side Of Rect
        

        Returns:
        New Matrix
        See Also:
        #createOrthographic(float, float, float, float, Matrix3) Mat3.createOrthographic(l, r, b, t, new Mat3())}
